QUESTION_1.body: What do you value more in a workplace, consistency or potential for growth?

QUESTION_2.body: Are you willing to put in extra hours for the sake of promotion?

QUESTION_3.body: How important is work-life balance to you?

QUESTION_4.body: How do your personal ethics influence your job choices?

QUESTION_5.body: Are you more of a group collaborator or an independent worker?

QUESTION_6.body: What kind of workspace do you prefer?

QUESTION_7.body: Do you think of your future career as a way to realize your best self, or an avenue to make money?
